AI Description: QGIS is a free and open-source cross-platform desktop geographic information system (GIS) application that supports viewing, editing, and analysis of geospatial data.
Core Features: Supports Various Vector, Raster, & Database Formats, Advanced Data Visualization & Analysis Tools, Plugins For Additional Functionality & Customization, Support For Georeferencing & Map Projections, Print Composer For Creating High-Quality Maps
